content.detailedDescription: At approx 08:05pm on september 17, 2014 i was on the front porch of my house walking out the door to greet my wife who had just pulled in front of the house in her mini van. a starlight white light i caught out of the corner of my eye move quickly from the northeast to the east and was in the sky at about 45 degrees. i then turn my head to look at it and it was stationary for about 10 or 15 seconds and then decended quickly changing colors to red. then it ascended quickly to almost where it started then turned blue and shot ten degrees ten degrees to the southest and stopped. at this point my wife was exiting her van and i pointed to it and told her to watch it, she observed it moving southward slowly changing colors and decend quickly. that was the last i could observe it because it when behind a tree and i lost track of it. i recorded the object with my smart phone but i could not see it when i replayed the video. i still have the video maybe it can be lighted up.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Starlight light doing strange thing in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the living room watching tv when my mom contacted me and told me to look outside.  i went outside and saw what appeared to be the same (or same type?) object that i reported in case number 59412.  it was hovering noiselessly at what appeared to be a similar altitude as my other report.  it behaved much the same way it did in my last report with little zig zag and slow ascents and descents.  more of the "lightening" flashes accompanied it, however this time they were to the northeast.  there was also the same creepy feeling and dead silence.  

since the other sighting, i've been a little more prepared and had a pair of binoculars near the door.  i got those and used a porch post to make sure they would be steady and located the object.  through the binoculars i could see a pattern of dim lights in a v formation with the point almost directly facing my direction.  the very back lights was a dim red then blue then a greenish white (  that wasn't visible with the naked eye) then the brilliant white.  as i watched one would flash brightly then quickly dim and another would quickly flash in what appeared to be a random order.  none of the lights ever completely went out though.  

i also believe it to be one solid object rather than eight  as i was watching it, i observed a smaller white light shoot away from it at high speed.  it sped away to the east and also flashed.  though it stayed only white. it was clearly visible through the binoculars, however my mom could see it dimly with the naked eye as well.  

just as my other report, it slowly made it's way up and away to the northeast as the "lightening" tapered off.
content.summary: I observed an object hovering and flashing noiselessly in the sky for approximately 20 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I was just getting home, as i walked up my driveway i looked to the north and saw a yellow and orange glowing anomaly. the anomaly moved north from my home, as it moved it would randomly disappear then appear a little further from where it was originally. it did this about 5 times until it just never returned also the object gave no sound i waited 15 minutes  to see if object would return.
content.summary: Bright orb shaped object, pulsating yellow and orange

content.detailedDescription: Estaba estacionado en un carro viendo de frente el cerro en el estado de mexico, cuando observe como una luz lo que reconozco como ovni descendio al cerro y apago su luz, posteriormente mirando  vi como volvio ascender y con un movimiento extraño medio circulo se dirigio a otra parte del cerro donde volvio a descender y apagar su luz. el avistamiento fue algo rapido y las condiciones no me permitieron grabar , eh tenido mucha curiosidad de ir a investigar el cerro aunque no tengo la experiencia y con algo de miedo, pero eh tenido la suerte de ver muchos avistamientos  en el cielo y me parece fascinante.
content.summary: Ovni decendiendo a un cerro apagando su luz , volvio ascender cambio de trayectoria y aterrizo de nuevo en el cerro se apago su luz

content.detailedDescription:
1. where i was? i was on a break.
2. i noticed the object when looking up at 2 planes flying overhead, both going different directions and on different levels in the sky. i noticed the ufo nearby the two planes and moving in a straight path, extremely slow, away from the planes. the reflective surface is what caught my attention.
3. i didnt know what the object was at first. first thought was 3 different planes in the same general area, different levels?
4. the object was reflective surface, possible round or round but flat? or an aspirin on its side, but tiny. the object was in the vicinity of sky that the two planes were in. maybe not same level, but same visual area. the object moved very slowly away from the planes and the planes kept on their usual route and eventually went out of sight. after the planes were gone, the object just seemed to hover up in the sky and sit there. approximately 5 minutes. i went inside to get my phone and came back outside and the object was gone. i scanned the sky to see if i could find it and there it was, in another part of the sky, further away. i looked down trying to set up camera in my phone and when i looked up again, the object was gone again. i finished up my break, eyes glancing over the horizon, saw another plane, this plane was black or dark color and watched it fly its route and suddenly appeared the reflective ufo above this plane and when the plane was a little further past the ufo, the ufo disappeared again. this time in front of my eyes. it just "blinked" out. one minute it was there, the next it wasnt. 
5. my feelings, reactions, actions during and after sighting were mild excitement, nothing extreme.
6. lost sight of this object more than once. the last time i visually saw it leave. it just disappeared. blinked out? shut off? went invisible?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unidentified flying object seen nearby 2 planes that were overhead

content.detailedDescription: Father was with admiral byrd in a submarine, according to the history channel a project name was attached to it. nasa was hacked. similarities. case was designated "powerhold". byrd was sent to location in antarctica to explore empty facility from the russians. all aboard a submarine, returned and all died within 1 year. believed to have been confronted by an alien craft.
content.summary: Father was with admiral byrd in a submarine, according to the history channel a project name was attached to it. nasa was hacked. simalarities

content.detailedDescription: Waiting to launch boat to go fishing notice the spiral in the sky much like the one russia not to long ago that was on tv - then a small cloud formed and the opened up and shot the cigar object out of the hole and then the whole thing disappeared, tried to grab phone to take a picture but it happened all to fast and we were stunned at what we were seeing
content.summary: Spiral shaped clould spinning, holw opened up in center, something came thru then poof gone

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my room approximately 1 am, decided i was going to go outside with my camera phone and take pictures of the sky, i seen a bright light hovering/moving around a little bit. first thought immediately was a starcraft, ufo, something i've never seen in my life. the more i watched the more it took shape, brightened, and came closer, looked like it was hovering over houses in sauk village,illinois, rectangle, triangle, millenium falcon/star wars, bird of prey/star trek, from the bottom lights of the craft, i could see a neck and head of the aircraft. the ufo was stationary pretty much the whole time after i fixated on it, but in the beginning the bright light caught my attention and moved a little bit, but was completely stationary afterwards the whole time. i knew it was something different, other worldly, that was in the sky, i was hysterical, and freaked out, i was worn out from watching it, went to bed, just laying there couldn't go to sleep, i got back up opened my door it was still there, closed the door and fell asleep. looked at the photos later, on computer, and seen more details, and was even more hysterical!! i have over 40 pictures some are great quality, the quality is not coming out as good when i upload the pictures, they are clear on this computer though, you can see everything, kind of scary, we are seeing more here than uploading.
content.features: Window(s), Patterned Surface, Insignia, Appendage(s), Louvres
content.summary: Approximately 1am. was standing outside seen a hovering bright light, the more i observed the more it took shape, and illuminated, 40+ pictures.

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was walking dog and often look up to the skies at night.
2.  it was stable as a star constellation and began to move.
3.  unknown
4.  stable as a star for moments, indifferent from any star, then began to move across the sky southwest, approximately one minute and disappeared
5.  i believe.
6.  disappeared.
content.summary: Sighted star of vega, but know vega not apparent in sky in september. point of vega began to move in five second as i watched.  star-like object disappeared after five seconds of observation.

content.detailedDescription: Traveling east on hwy 580 coming down dublin grade in sfo bay area . at hwy 680 to the north we saw a craft with its strobes multi light blinking consequently around craft. we past underneath and it  kept on heading south on hwy 680 along the mountains of the 680 west side... wanted to follow it and very easily could have but was in a rush to get home it was 10pm on sept 16, 2014  than traveling along hwy 580 going south we saw in the  distance a strobe light at around the area of mount hamilton blinking as we left for why 132 toward modesto california
content.summary: Rectangale in shape light blinking around not like a aircraft.  later when we tried to take a picture a spot beam came from behind.

content.detailedDescription:
I left my home at approximately 5:20 pm to pick up my daughter at our high school where she was attending marching band practice.I arrived at the school about 5:28 pm, band was still playing.I parked my car as usual to wait for the band to finish practice.
the high school sits on top of a large hill or small mountain in western north carolina with beautiful views of the blue ridge mountains,especially at sunset! 
as i was sitting in my car waiting for my daughter, i had a strong urge or intuition to open my sunroof and take a photo of the cloud formations. the sun was peeking out of a large cloud, was nearly blinding. so, i opened up sunroof, held my camera up, pointed it in the direction of the sun and clouds and without looking or focusing due to the brightness of th3 sun, i simply clicked button to take picture.
i immediately lowered camera to review shot. for a split second i didn't notice anything abnormal but then the beautiful blue orb or object caught my eye. then i saw the lavender aura or something surrounding said object.I instantly looked up through my sunroof to find the orb but could not see it with my naked eyes.
when i returned home i transferred image to my computer for a better look. i then played around with some photo filters. the filter i used in one of the attached photos was a negative filter which seemed to make the object pop. you can also see what appears to be a trail of some sort under object.I have no clue what this object is, could be a planet for all i know! lol. i just found it interesting, especially the strong urge to suddenly open my sunroof to take a photo. if anyone knows what this object is, please let me know, curious.
content.summary: Pale blue orb or object with a lavender aura around said object.

content.detailedDescription: As fotografias foram tiradas por meu pai e sua esposa, quando retornavam para sua residência.
content.summary: Luzes que se pareciam com vórtices

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on i-95 s on monday, september 15th at around 10:30 am, when i noticed a double rainbow in the sky. i got out my smartphone to photograph the rainbow, and took four pictures in succession. on the fourth photograph i captured what appears to be a ufo, flying really fast next to the rainbow. as quickly as it appeared, it was gone.
content.summary: Driving on i-95 s in fort lauderdale, took picture of double rainbow, then spotted ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I was just outside our house in escondido at approximately 4:40am on the morning of 9/16/2014. my husband just went back inside for a minute. i was staring up at the sky, stargazing as i very often do. it's a treat when i get to see a meteorite or even a passing satellite. but this time... 

there were two very bright, but very high lights passing from east to west. i've seen many satellites passing in my life, and if i had to guess, they were many miles from each other, but within about 5 degrees from each other in my field of view. they looked like most satellites do when passing, a white to red/orange reflective light, but they were slightly brighter than other satellites i had observed.  one following the other perfectly. 

then, a few seconds after i saw them, they rotated about an axis and switched positions while still moving west, and continued on in perfectly swapped places. then the new lead light continued on, while the new trailing light veered off south and disappeared. the leading light soon disappeared (faded) as i would expect of a satellite reentering the earth's shadow.

all of this in the span of 15-20 seconds. my observation covered an arc of about 45 degrees from the time i noticed until the remaining light was not visible.

i have observed many passing satellites, the space station, the old shuttles in my life.  i am a smoker who is up late night and early morning and go outside and stare at the sky.  i've never seen an event like this, and my main reaction was to repeatedly say out loud "what the f#&$".  and this was of course one of the few times i've walked outside without my phone on me, not that i think it would have recorded a viable video even if i had gotten to it in time.
content.summary: Two passing orbiting lights, similar to satellites, change position about axis and then direction change.

content.detailedDescription: I was  on the porch smoking, on my way out to the parking lot i noticed really bright lights in the sky shifting through out the sky in a zig zag motion and afterwards continued normal i thought to myself this really isn't an airplane,it's traveling way to fast! 2 neighbors were outiside and heard the jet like noises , i know the difference between planes and military crafts and this was neither of the 2 .
content.summary: I had 2 witnesses who heard the noise but object was gone when they came to look i know i'm not tripping.

content.detailedDescription:
1 - close to home after dryland mushing with siberians
2 - i did not notice object until i uploaded my photos taken.
3 - i do not know
4 - 50 or so yards away in first photo - within  5 secs 5 feet away (in photo)
5 - curious
6 - only saw in photo

ps:  this was not seen by naked eye - i just took a few photos at the moment and this is what showed up in photos
content.summary: Not a ufo -

content.detailedDescription:
Thanks for the guideline to follow for reporting. this site is not nearly as intimidating as i feared.

1. i was in my grandfathers garden 1/2 mile from home in the middle of nowhere. it was my turn that night to sit in the garden until after dark to shoot at and scare away the predators that were eating the crop...Mostly deer, rabbits and raccoon. 

2. i arrived to the garden by foot about 8:15 pm and took my post in the corn rows. i noticed some deer jumping the fence into the garden area right at dusk (approx 9:10 pm.). i waited a few minutes for the rest of the deer to enter the garden before lifting myself above the corn stalks to fire away. when i quietly raised up on my knee, i noticed the deer were gone and that the street lights had come on. even though i did not know it at the time, this was my first sighting of the object. 

3. being a city boy, my first thought of the light was that it was the street lights coming on since it was dusk. since i was not alarmed, i looked back to the dirt and continued drawing naked stick figures and lust notes to my sweetheart back home. suddenly it dawned on me that there are no street lights out here. as a matter of fact, there are no houses or people on the property where i "saw" the light because we have very few neighbors for miles. at this point, i focused my attention on the "street light" in the next pasture 300' away.

4. numbers four and five of the guide may be repeated since the object appeared, disappeared and reappeared to interact with me on numerous occasions. 
   4.A). i observed the light 300' away due east and slightly above the tree line in the next pasture. i thought it was unusual because there was no homestead in that direction. i observed the light for at least five minutes or so as it moved from side to side (north to south) over the pasture. it never made a noise and did not light up the landscape. it was an orange yellow glow that did not emit light and it quietly, smoothly and slowly hovered above ground as it moved from side to side.
   4b. after a while, the light shot straight up into the sky without a noise and disappeared straight in the air. at this point, i was not scared and thinking like a normal fifteen year old boy. it was cool that i could tell my friends that i saw a ufo. at this point, that is all it was.
   4c. after several minutes thinking how cool the sighting was, i turned on the miner's light fashioned to my head to walk home. suddenly the object reappeared and descended directly above me. i fell to the ground and cowered on my back with my 22 rifle pointed at the light as it continued its descent directly above me. thinking the glowing light was seeing my miners light, i turned off my light and kept my 22 rifle pointed at the descending light. 
   4d. the glowing light continued its descent until it was only 25' above me. at this point, i distinctly saw a silver metallic disk hovering over me. after a short time (seconds or minutes i don't recall), a door in the center of the bottom of the disc slid open and an apparatus extruded itself from the saucer that to me looked like a suction cup on the end of it. the whole time this was going on, neither the ground around me nor was i lit up with light. in other words, the craft did not emit light and it was totally silent. 
   4e most importantly, when the disk was hovering above me with the apparatus protruding from the bottom,i was able to observe the motion of the disc. it was not spinning or warbling or bouncing. it was gently oscillating back and forth between 45 degree angles.
   4f. thinking i was going to be sucked into the craft, i continued to keep my rifle pointed at the craft knowing i would never pull the trigger. to be honest, at this point i figured my grandparents would track me to here and never find me again. 
   4g. after an unknown time expired, the apparatus that looked like a suction cup to me was retracted into the bottom of the saucer shaped craft and the door on the bottom of the disc closed shut. within five minutes of the door closing, the object shot straight up in the sky and disappeared over the west horizon at a very high rate of speed. never once making a sound and never breaking the sound barrier, even though its rate of speed far exceeded the military jets that we commonly saw and heard break the sound barrier. 
   4h. thankful the encounter was over, i lay trembling on the ground 1/2 mile from home in the middle of nowhere. i was small for my age and very slow to boot. i got up to lumber home and suddenly the object re appeared from the eastern horizon and silently shot directly overhead. it paused very briefly as i stared at the object with my miner's light on and then it dove directly towards me. 
   4i. i was mesmerized by the the object and dove head first into the pea patch while keeping my eye on the object. as it swooped directly at me at about a 45 degree angle, i saw the full shape of the disc and then it became a full fledged flying saucer. it got so close to me that i could see the full cross section of the saucer with what i perceived as windows and i closed my eyes and began to make deals with god.I did not open my eyes for many minutes (at least five minutes) and found myself alone in the wild when i found the courage to open my eyes. i was afraid to open my eyes for fear of what i might see in the windows.

5.The best way to describe my feelings is unadulterated fear because of the isolation in the country. even though i did my best to remain alert the entire time and make meticulous mental notes once i realized this may be a once in a lifetime event, there is no way to share with the world what i know i saw.

6. i lost sight of the saucer when i closed my eyes and refused to open them.
 
my close encounter is the single most significant event in my life. after laying in the dirt for minutes once i opened my eyes again, i had to decide if i should try to run home or wait for my grandparents to come find me. being the slowest kid on the team and in the school, i went against conventional wisdom and made the conscious decision that running home was in my best interest. the knowledge of the physics of speed imparted on me for survival have continued to carry me far in life.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Totally silent.Long duration. metallic saucer shape object oscillated when hovering. disappeared and returned multiple times. witnessed windows and apparatus on bottom after door opened.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving the house with my wife to go grab a bite to eat. we were driving out on my street going east.
the sky was completely clear and blue. sunset had started and i was looking at the sky admiring the scenery. the sun light coming from the west was shining bright when reflected by planes crusing at very high altitude. i saw at least 6 planes cruising at very high altitude, probably 30k to 36k feet, following two routes patrern from east to west. every single one of the planes had very visible chemtrails. 
then i realized there was a extremely bright esphere by one of the airplanes. it stroke me as odd, because it was too early yet for stars to appear in the sky. i told my wife to look at it, and we both realized that the brightness of the object was coming from the reflection of the sun light. it was definitely metalic and reflecting the sun light. but how could that be? the object was in the form of a large esphere, about 2 to 3 times the size of the airplane nearby it. it was crusing along the airplane. about the same altitude and same speed. no chemtrail whatsoever! we realized then that we could be looking at a ufo! we were very skeptical at first. but then the object which seemed to be following the airplane, turned to the opposite side, and start accelerating eastward. the speed in which it was going was about 10 times the speed of the planes. then it just went straight up and the bright faded until it was gone out of sight, which took about 3 to 5 seconds! we could tell it was going up because it was not going in the direction of the horizon.
that was it. my wife and i looked at each other almost not believing what just had happened!
content.summary: Shiny sphere following airplane turned 180o and vanished into the sky

content.detailedDescription: Sept16/2014 .. today my neighbor my wife and i watched 3 stars take different formations and sometimes disapear behind clouds or by some trick of the light. i have pictures and original sd card but not the current means to transfer them to the site as this is on my phone.. i told the story better twice to have the page mess up on me so this is the short version.. would love to hear anything about what these objects could be as its not the first time weve seen these.. also while looking at these stars i got little sparkles of light aswell but figured it was just from staring so hard.. would love to share my photos and hear any theories or similar sightings thanks.. for 40 minutes they hovered and danced around one another settling sometimes in a lin or triangle was very weird yet exciting...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watched as 3 stars danced and disapeared in the middle of the day!

content.detailedDescription: Outside on my deck.  saw an object hovering about 500 feet from my house.  when a plane was seen by me, the object turned abruptly and ascended rapidly and flew in a southwest direction.  no sound.  i live approximately 1/2 mile from a densely forested wildlife refuge.
content.summary: Triangular shaped object with pulsating lights that hovered, then ascended rapidly and flew in southwest direction.  no sound.  lights pulsated and flashed sequentially.  very close to my house.  when a plane was in the distance, it abruptly ascended

content.detailedDescription: It was september 10,2014 around 9:15 pm eastern time. we were on vacation at ocean city , md. we were staying at a hotel on 21st street. we were on the balcony watching bikes/cars go by us on the main street when i saw a really bright orange light in the sky, i told the 3 other people i was with to look. wile we all were looking (from left to right)like 6 more appeared, then they went out one by one (from left to right)it lasted about 30 sec. they were in a row horizontally. then in a few sec.,they started lighting up again but they were vertically (from top to bottom)but this time there was like 5 of them. then they went out one by one (from top to botton).They did not move across the sky at all. i am always looking in the sky at aircraft, stars, planets,. i do know the differance from aircraft & stars ..... i can not tell you what i saw that night, nothing that i know lights up that way!! the location in the sky was about 150deg.(se)& i was facing 90deg (east)& the lights were over the atlantic ocean that night. i could not belive what we all saw that night, i was like you all know what we just saw.... they were ufo's !!! one of the people that i was with really dont believe in ufo's, but now i think he does !!
content.summary: 6-7 orange lights faded on / faded off,left to right. then faded on/off vertical top to bottom.

content.detailedDescription: On 15/sept/2014 my girlfriend noticed an object "light" in the sky. light stayed stationary for approx 30 to 45 min and then observed a separate  aircraft (plane) overhead.Object became extremely bright,then dimmed and observed a shape of an inverted wye, became bright again and moved on the horizontal to the left and started blinking simultaneously with the (plane) aircraft. lost view of (plane) aircraft and object seemed to wonder in a circular motion and continue blinking. object then traveled to the right and disappeared. witness made mention of noticing noise from overhead aircraft as a plane but cannot say any noise came from observed light /object. witness states that object seemed to follow or travel parallel with the plane until witness lost sight of plane.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Stationary 4 long time, got briter and started blinking,drifed left, random movements,mimicked plane overhead, disappered

content.detailedDescription: As i was cooking on my grill i looked up to the sky and saw a brilliant point of light that looked as bright as venus,but as it was straight up i knew it was not a planet.My 1st thought was perhaps a supernova as this was still in the daylight and in the direction of where the big dipper would be at that time. i checked the time at 7:05pm and then got my 7x50 binoculars but i could not hold them steady as the object was almost straight up.So then i went in and got my 11x80 binoculars and a tripod to hold them steady. it was a large clear sphere brilliantly illuminated but with a dark strip through the center that had a bend to it.I watched the object until 7:25pm when it started to fade and change color now to a burnt orange.I then ran in to get my laser pointer but when i came back out it had vanished!
content.summary: Glowing sphere

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my apartment in the nine floor of the building i used to live in.
my father called me screaming, when i came next to him we both saw a boomerang shape ufo flying above the city and below the clouds.
we could only see the shape of the obeject as it passes below the clouds, it looks if it was made out of water. the obeject made a small direction change and the went above the clouds, and we lost sight of it.
the hole thing happen in 10 seconds.
my father is a federal agent with more than 30 years experience on operational work and never seen nothing like that.
content.summary: My father fist watched then called me to see this boomerang transparent ufo bellow the clouds, above city
content.locationName: Presidente Prudente, State of São Paulo

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in the back yard with a friend and pointed out a large, slow and strange moving object in the sky. i'm not sure what made me notice it. we agreed no airplane could move that slow and strange, and no helicopter was that big. i ran and got the camera, took the attached picture and when i went to take another picture i could not find it and my friend who was keeping an eye on it said it just disappeared. i forgot about this picture and really expected to see a plane, helicopter or string of mylar balloons, but this is what came out.
content.summary: Very slow, strange moving, large airplane shaped

content.detailedDescription:
We had stopped for coffee in cuba, nm, the last leg of a riding journey back to new mexico.  we often stop in cuba on our way home from northern rides.  on leaving, on route 550, we spotted this bright orb in the sky that appeared to be shining something akin to a spotlight down on us.  it hovered in place, did not take a path, for a long time.  we snapped photos from the moving bike, on a cell phone — best we could do at the time as gregg, the driver, was also eager to get home at this point after 2 weeks on the road.  he snapped one pic at the normal distance, and two zoomed, which we are attaching.  we saw not other reports for two days, then today we see other reports emerging from the albuquerque and santa fe areas, same time, same object, same story.  some videos have appeared with the reports as well.  so let us add ours to the photographic evidence.

this was no weather balloon — high, exceptionally bright, shining, elongated with varied edges seen on the blow up of the photo — kind of cigar shaped or oval, with brighter aura on bottom edges like orbs we've seen with blue edges.  it was watched for 30-45 minutes while riding, and then could not be seen.  very significant presence in the sky — not other objects in sky, definitely not a star or planet by it's bright, bright light very close compared to stars.  

hope this helps and something is discovered about it!
content.summary: Seen while riding motorcycle from cuba, nm toward albuquerque, 6:30 approx., route 550, photographed from the bike, cell phone.

content.detailedDescription: I was woken up around 10:00 a.M. by the sound of a helicopter passing back and forth over my apt. . i tried to go back to sleep but i couldn't so i went outside on my balcony with my ex wife . i could not see any helicopters , but i did see a small cessna airplane flying low approach in our local airport . and as i was looking at the bottom of the plane , in the airspace between the plane and me about 30 white orbs appeared out of thin air . i kept asking my ex , what is that , what is that . they were all at the same altitude moving at the same slow speed . when all of a sudden a few of them changed colors . the one i was looking at turned red and i went from wonder to fear very quickly . i then went out side to follow them and just like that they disappeared . they were in a cluster formation the whole time they were visable . no sound at all . another time me and my ex wife were on the balcony at night were we saw a long flat rectangle shape probe slowly flying barley above the roof tops . at first sight it looked crome like a car bumper , but as it flew by we literally saw it slowly turn invisible like the predator . it made no noise , it had no wings , propellers , or jets . it was so close i could have hit it with a rock . just a flat long rectangle .
content.summary: I was on my second story balcony one day time sighting multiple orbs one nighttime sighting a solid rectangle

content.detailedDescription:
1: in the navarra mountains , enjoying the peace & quit and the view
2: playing back the photos in order to select a few to send to family via email
3: it raised my suspicions because i didn't see it during the seconds it took to take several snaps as to make a panoramic surround collection of images  . i don't know what it is or why i have captured it on my ipad .
4: suddenly it was there , on one image , and then somewhere else ( although with a different appearance ) on another image
5: looking at the images later with my wife , i was surprised ( as were we both ) to see what had actually been captured in the lens of my ipad . i didn't notice anything whilst taking the actual snaps .
6: i didn't know i had seen anything ,, or  to be more accurate , i saw nothing at the time .
content.summary: Noticed object( objects ) only after reviewing photos

content.detailedDescription: Private
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was at st.Marys  soup kitchen, around 100   there, came out of clouds.Hovered.Banked right into clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughters and i were standing on our home's upper floor deck using our google sky map to locate stars and planets on saturday evening, september 13. we have a large star field and good visibility from the farm we live on.  we noticed an odd orb shape in the sky, and turned our google sky map towards it, but it did not indicate that anything should be there of significance. we noticed that the orb was pulsing different colors randomly, and moving in jerky motions up and down, side to side. sometimes big jumps, sometimes small. we watched for a while as it continued to do this to see if it moved from the area, but it did not. we then both individually noticed and commented on at the same time, seeing a large white flash of light, like a flashbulb going off in the sky to the right of the object, and streaking straight towards it, creating a trail of light behind it.  i thought that might be a shooting star, but it looked more like an explosion and moved straight across towards the pulsating orb, dissapearing into it.

my daughters and i watch the nightsky a lot, and this was something none of us had ever witnessed.
content.summary: Pulsing color changing orb with odd movement in night sky.
